Curel Moisture Repair Eye Cream

Brand: Curel

Category: Around Eye Cream

Ingredients: WATER/AQUA, HYDROGENATED POLYISOBUTENE, GLYCERIN, CETYL-PG HYDROXYETHYL PALMITAMIDE, DIMETHICONE, POLYGLYCERYL-2 DIISOSTEARATE, PEG-10 DIMETHICONE, DIMETHICONE/PEG-10/15 CROSSPOLYMER, DEXTRIN PALMITATE, CETYL ALCOHOL, GLYCERYL BEHENATE, ALLANTOIN, SODIUM METHYL STEAROYL TAURATE, BUTYLENE GLYCOL, PEG-60 HYDROGENATED CASTOR OIL,

DIMETHICONE, DIMETHICONE/PEG-10/15 CROSSPOLYMER, DEXTRIN PALMITATE, CETYL ALCOHOL, GLYCERYL BEHENATE, ALLANTOIN, SODIUM METHYL STEAROYL TAURATE, BUTYLENE GLYCOL, PEG-60 HYDROGENATED CASTOR OIL, SUCCINIC ACID, ZINGIBER OFFICINALE (GINGER) ROOT EXTRACT, SODIUM HYDROXIDE, EUCALYPTUS GLOBULUS LEAF EXTRACT, TOCOPHEROL, PHENOXYETHANOL, SODIUM BENZOATE
Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
